com.meli.api.coupon.repository

Class ItemRepositoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meli.api.coupon.repository.ItemRepositoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IItemRepository

    @Repository
public class ItemRepositoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IItemRepository
    This repository handles the MercadoLibre API calls to get the items and its prices. This information is cached in order to access it more efficiently.
